title: Looking for dedicated ADC (Plat+)
body:
Hello  so i have decided to main Support ({{champion:16}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} ) this season and the next my goal: Diamond! =D
>>Please add me if you meet these requirements<<
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---Personality----                                                                                                     
-Someone that can always see the positive                                                   
-Good to talk with                                                                                                
-In general just a nice person                                                                             
---Communication--- 
-TeamSpeak3
-Skype
-Discord/Curse
Any of these will do
---Last of all---
-Someone that is 100% focused on achieving a goal of them self
-willing to improve and learn from mistakes 
-Flexible 
-Plat 5+ or gold 1 the lowest
Has a lot of experience already with ADC
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks for taking the time to read =D
